docblock.long-description: Add tags to images

tag.name: param
tag.description: The tag value to be added to the image.

tag.name: param
tag.description: 6-digit image ID.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

docblock.long-description: List the tags for an image

tag.name: param
tag.description: The 6-digit UID for an image. Also can accept a tag basename if the search_by parameter is set to basename.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Valid values are 'image' or 'basename'.

docblock.long-description: Get all images that have a certain tag.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The basename value for a particular tag.

docblock.long-description: This is used to find suggested tags by giving it parts of text, and it will return the 10 closest matches for existing tags.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Partial text that is used to query for existing tag names.

docblock.long-description: Returns the top 200 used tags and a count of the number of times they are used.
Removes a tag from an image. Must be an admin to access.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Tag id.

tag.name: param
tag.description: 6-digit image id.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Completely removes a specific tag from all images it is on. Must be an admin to access.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Tag id.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Changes the display name of a tag. The basename will not change. Must be admin to access.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Tag id.

tag.name: param
tag.description: New tag name.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Allows reporting of problematic tags so they may undergo review.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The numeric id of an tag.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number value representing the reason type which can be found in report/all

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie.

markers.todo: need a way to retrieve tag data by tag_id
this should link to some tag report interface where it can be removed.

docblock.long-description: Retrieve details about a user account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: By default, this is the user_id of an account. This can also be a username if the "search_by" parameter is set to "username".

tag.name: param
tag.description: Valid values are 'id' or 'username'.

docblock.long-description: Retrieve user details of currently logged in account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Login to an account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Valid username.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Valid password.

docblock.long-description: Logout of an account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. If sid cookie headers are sent, this value is not required.

docblock.long-description: Create new user account and login as that user.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Any unique string used to login to an account

tag.name: param
tag.description: Any string

tag.name: param
tag.description: This can also be any string, but a valid email address would be required to do any password recovery.

docblock.long-description: Load all saved images for a user account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Provide the username of the user to view their saved images. Currently can only view your own saved images when logged in. If not set, the currently logged in user will be used.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. Only required if the cookie sid header is not sent.

docblock.long-description: Load all uploaded images for a user account.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Provide the username of the user to view their saved images. Currently can only view your own saved images when logged in. If not set, the currently logged in user will be used.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Session ID that is provided when logged in. This is also set as a cookie. Only required if the cookie sid header is not sent.

docblock.description: Request a reset of the users password

tag.description: Provide the username of the user to send the password reset email to.

docblock.long-description: Change password for account

tag.name: param
tag.description: New password

tag.name: param
tag.description: This is either a valid SID of a logged in user, or a password reset ID
